item.title: How to download online videos
item.description: Download the youtube-dl command line tool from brew brew install youtube-dl youtube-dl supports a huge list of extractors, including popular sites like YouTube and Vimeo. List all extractors and pipe it into grep to search for an extractor youtube-dl --list-extractors | grep "udemy" To download a video youtube-dl "video-url" Simply pass in the cookie file to download videos that require login credentials youtube-dl --cookies <path-to-cookie-file> "video-url" You can use a browser extension like cookie.
